channel.title: vnc on Guangchuang Yu
channel.description: Recent content in vnc on Guangchuang Yu

item.title: realvnc：各种设备互联
item.description: Virtual Network Computing (VNC) is a special way to remotely control a computer. Like Secure Shell (SSH), a computer user can login to a remote machine on the network and execute commands and access files on the system. However, VNC displays the remote system’s desktop while SSH displays a terminal shell. It may be beneficial to learn more about VNC and similar technologies.

item.title: 通过VNC连接Linux远程桌面
item.description: 对于Unix-like系统，远程桌面实在太容易，通过ssh隧道，只要加-X参数即可，如果网速较慢，可以加-C参数，对图像进行压缩。ESS都支持通过这个方法把R命令发送到服务器端执行。
